title: Full AndroidManifest API now in Rust
selftext:
Hey, guys! We just finished implementing AndroidManifest API in rust. Now library supports all features in the latest Android API level 30. We hope that this piece will make Rust Android support just a little better :)

[https://github.com/dodorare/android-manifest-rs](https://github.com/dodorare/android-manifest-rs)
